sentences.sContent: Meanwhile, researchers are thinking about gene-therapy trials for other inherited retinal diseases as well as for more common disorders such as macular degeneration.
sentences.sContent_eng: Meanwhile, researchers are thinking about gene-therapy trials for other inherited retinal diseases as well as for more common disorders such as macular degeneration.
sentences.sCn: 同时，研究者正考虑为其他遗传性视网膜疾病和诸如黄斑变性等的常见病进行基因治疗试验。

sentences.sContent: This paper introduce the differences in thymidine kinase(TK) isoenzymes and the relation of them to cancer and cell cycle as well as the progress of gene-therapy of cancer based on tk gene.
sentences.sContent_eng: This paper introduce the differences in thymidine kinase(TK) isoenzymes and the relation of them to cancer and cell cycle as well as the progress of gene-therapy of cancer based on tk gene.
sentences.sCn: 重点介绍了各种胸苷激酶（TK）同工酶的差异及其与癌症和细胞周期的关系，并介绍了最近利用tk基因进行肿瘤基因治疗研究的进展。

sentences.sContent: And the participants will be monitored for 15 years for health impacts, as is required by the FDA for any gene-therapy trials.
sentences.sContent_eng: And the participants will be monitored for 15 years for health impacts, as is required by the FDA for any gene-therapy trials.
sentences.sCn: 根据FDA对任何基因疗法试验的要求，试验参与者将要接受为期15年的监测，以明确该疗法的健康影响。

trans.tranOther: Gene therapy is the use of genetic material to treat disease
